other_tests.findings: Patent TIPS noted on imaging studies.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Unchanged compared to the ECG obtained on the admission.

other_tests.findings: Candidal esophagitis and a 2 cm gastric ulcer with a pigmented center surrounded by necrotic tissue.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Biopsy specimens showed persistence of the gastric ulcer during treatment.

other_tests.findings: Necrotic ulcer with granulation tissue; broad, nonseptate fungal hyphae consistent with mucormycosis.
